text.div:
Generated Narrative: ImplementationGuide openhie.fhir.zambia-immunizations

ZambiaImmunizationsIG

The official URL for this implementation guide is: 

http://openhie.org/fhir/zambia-immunizations/ImplementationGuide/openhie.fhir.zambia-immunizations

Zambia Immunizations FHIR Implementation Guide.
